promptPrefix:
Your task is to research and summarize the text in 60 words or no more than 300 characters. Your research should be related to service provider companies. 

Write the meta description text related to the service. 
This text must contain the keyword and meta descriptions synonymous. Write in marketing language stile.

Write the meta description of the service.

Every piece of output must be written in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. The text summarizes this:

[PROMPT]
title: GMB Services Meta Description.
